issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h3. Steps to Reproduce
Open Titanium Studio and wait for the Dashboard window to show. The welcome text, tab labels (e.g., Get Started), Featured video titles (e.g., Preparing for Mobile Development), and all the text under Titantium Resources are too narrow (skinny) to read. See the attached screen shot.

h3. Actual Result
Too narrow text

h3. Expected Result
Too narrow text
fields.summary: Dashboard text is too narrow to read

comments.body: Looking at the log files, it appears that you are running into this issue on Windows. Can you please let us know the Windows version and screen resolution you are using so that we can reproduce this issue in-house?

Resolving this ticket as we have not been able to reproduce the issue and we have not received the requested information from the reporter. We would be happy to reopen the ticket and investigate it further if you can provide the requested information.
